CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
OldVersion.description: This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
OldVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint
- Document is unscannable
- Document didn't complete scanning
- Document name matches patterns
- Document size equals or is greater than

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint
- Document is unscannable
- Document didn't complete scanning
- Document name matches patterns
- Document size equals or is greater than

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Dynamic watermarking is a new sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Dynamic watermarking is a new sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Questions surfacing in Copilot results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage questions from communities, storyline, and Answers will surface in Copilot results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Questions surfacing in Copilot results
OldVersion.description: Viva Engage questions from communities, storyline, and Answers will surface in Copilot results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
OldVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC general availability
CurrentVersion.description:
Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC, your AI assistant for work in the GCC environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is available in Teams (Chat and Channel) excluding Compose, Outlook (includes mobile), Word, PowerPoint, and Excel as well as other surfaces, including microsoft365.com.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/public-sector-blog/microsoft-copilot-for-microsoft-365-gcc-ga-update-empowering/ba-p/4222952

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC general availability
OldVersion.description:
Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC, your AI assistant for work in the GCC environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is available in Teams (Chat and Channel) excluding Compose, Outlook (includes mobile), Word, PowerPoint, and Excel as well as other surfaces, including microsoft365.com.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/public-sector-blog/microsoft-copilot-for-microsoft-365-gcc-ga-update-empowering/ba-p/4222952

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Support for Document Property Predicate on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend the condition 'Document Property is' to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Support for Document Property Predicate on Endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend the condition 'Document Property is' to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to take control during screensharing on Web
CurrentVersion.description: This update enables meeting participants using the Microsoft Teams web app to use the "Take control" function to request control while another person is screen-sharing.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to take control during screensharing on Web
OldVersion.description: This update enables meeting participants using the Microsoft Teams web app to use the "Take control" function to request control while another person is screen-sharing.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
OldVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin management tasks enabled for all Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can manage membership, ownership, deletion, and restoration of Loop workspaces in the SharePoint Embedded admin center or PowerShell. These changes are visible within the Loop experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin management tasks enabled for all Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: Admins can manage membership, ownership, deletion, and restoration of Loop workspaces in the SharePoint Embedded admin center or PowerShell. These changes are visible within the Loop experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
OldVersion.description: The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Microsoft 365 Groups for Managing New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new Loop workspace, users can specify an existing Microsoft 365 Group to manage the workspace's lifetime, governance, and compliance, similar to SharePoint Team sites.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Microsoft 365 Groups for Managing New Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: When creating a new Loop workspace, users can specify an existing Microsoft 365 Group to manage the workspace's lifetime, governance, and compliance, similar to SharePoint Team sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
OldVersion.description: Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live caption translation in Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: While live captions display in the spoken language by default, on Teams Rooms on Windows, you can now choose the translation language you prefer without affecting what other meeting participants see. This feature is available on Teams Rooms Pro.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live caption translation in Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: While live captions display in the spoken language by default, on Teams Rooms on Windows, you can now choose the translation language you prefer without affecting what other meeting participants see. This feature is available on Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create with Copilot in Excel generates templates and tables
CurrentVersion.description: Create with Copilot in Excel helps customers write prompts to generate tailored templates and tables, using multi-turn conversion to refine the table schema, formulas, and visuals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create with Copilot in Excel generates templates and tables
OldVersion.description: Create with Copilot in Excel helps customers write prompts to generate tailored templates and tables, using multi-turn conversion to refine the table schema, formulas, and visuals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Kickstart your document with contextual prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot includes files and meetings based on your recent activity when suggesting prompts you can use to draft a new document in Word.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Kickstart your document with contextual prompts
OldVersion.description: Copilot includes files and meetings based on your recent activity when suggesting prompts you can use to draft a new document in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop –  Add a Loop Workspace to your Teams Channel
CurrentVersion.description: Channels in Microsoft Teams streamline collaboration by bringing people, content, and apps together and helping to organize them by project or topic. You will be able to add a Loop workspace tab to standard channels enabling your team to brainstorm, co-create, collect, and organize content—together in real-time. Everyone in the Team gets access to the Loop workspace, even as Team membership changes, and the workspace adheres to the governance, lifecycle, and compliance standards set by the Microsoft 365 Group backing the team. To get started, click the plus sign (+) at the top of the channel and select Loop from the app list.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop –  Add a Loop Workspace to your Teams Channel
OldVersion.description: Channels in Microsoft Teams streamline collaboration by bringing people, content, and apps together and helping to organize them by project or topic. You will be able to add a Loop workspace tab to standard channels enabling your team to brainstorm, co-create, collect, and organize content—together in real-time. Everyone in the Team gets access to the Loop workspace, even as Team membership changes, and the workspace adheres to the governance, lifecycle, and compliance standards set by the Microsoft 365 Group backing the team. To get started, click the plus sign (+) at the top of the channel and select Loop from the app list.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Chat with Copilot about selected text
CurrentVersion.description: Start a chat with Copilot while text in your document is selected, and Copilot's response will be scoped to what you have selected.

OldVersion.title: Word: Chat with Copilot about selected text
OldVersion.description: Start a chat with Copilot while text in your document is selected, and Copilot's response will be scoped to what you have selected.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Separate policies to control transcription for Town halls and Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Town halls and webinars will now have separate policies to allow or disable transcription in instances. Previously, the transcription policies for town halls and webinars automatically inherited the transcription policy set for meetings. This option to implement different policies for town hall and webinars is available for users on all licenses.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Separate policies to control transcription for Town halls and Webinars
OldVersion.description: Town halls and webinars will now have separate policies to allow or disable transcription in instances. Previously, the transcription policies for town halls and webinars automatically inherited the transcription policy set for meetings. This option to implement different policies for town hall and webinars is available for users on all licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Separate recording policies for Town halls and Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Town halls and webinars will now have separate policies to allow or disable recordings. Previously, the recording policies for town halls and webinars automatically inherited the recording policy set for meetings. This option to implement different policies for town hall and webinars is available for users on all licenses.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Separate recording policies for Town halls and Webinars
OldVersion.description: Town halls and webinars will now have separate policies to allow or disable recordings. Previously, the recording policies for town halls and webinars automatically inherited the recording policy set for meetings. This option to implement different policies for town hall and webinars is available for users on all licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a SharePoint OAL (Organization Asset Library), you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a SharePoint OAL (Organization Asset Library), you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Dictate your prompts in Copilot Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Use the dictation button to input your prompts with speech.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Dictate your prompts in Copilot Chat
OldVersion.description: Use the dictation button to input your prompts with speech.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
CurrentVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
OldVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.
